name: compute speed
compute speed
compute speed
compute acceleration
func:
let vz1 = flow.get("vz1") || 0
let vz2 = msg.payload
let acc = vz2-vz1
flow.set("vz1", vz2)
console.log("Acc=" + acc)
msg.payload = acc;
return msg;

name: compute acceleration
func:
let vx1 = flow.get("vx1") || 0
let vx2 = msg.payload
let acc = vx2-vx1
flow.set("vx1", vx2)
console.log("Acc=" + acc)
msg.payload = acc;
return msg;

name: compute acceleration
func:
let vy1 = flow.get("vy1") || 0
let vy2 = msg.payload
let acc = vy2-vy1
flow.set("vy1", vy2)
console.log("Acc=" + acc)
msg.payload = acc;
return msg;

name: create Json Node
create Json Node

create Json Node
Final Json
Node 1 (acceleration related)
func:
let node1 = {
"Safety": true,
"NodeID": "Integer",
"TimeStamp": Date.now(),
"TimeAccuracy": "Integer", 
"Sensors-Actuators": [
flow.get("accNode")],
"CRC": "Integer" 
}
flow.set("node1", node1)
return msg;

name: Node 2 (ambiant sensors)
func:
let node2 = {
"Safety": true,
"NodeID": "Integer",
"TimeStamp": Date.now(),
"TimeAccuracy": "Integer", 
"Sensors-Actuators": [
flow.get("tempNode"),
flow.get("pressureNode"),
flow.get("loadNode")
],
"CRC": "Integer" 
}
flow.set("node2", node2)
return msg;
